title: 479. Tread Softly
verses:
Be silent, be silent,
A whisper is heard;
Be silent, and listen,
Oh, treasure each word.

Be silent, be silent,
For holy this place,
This altar that echoes
The message of grace.

Be silent, be silent,
Breathe humbly our prayer;
A foretaste of Eden
This moment we share.

Be silent, be silent,
His mercy record;
Be silent, be silent,
And wait on the Lord.
chorus:
Tread softly, tread softly,
The Master is here;
Tread softly, tread softly,
He bids us draw near.
